item.title: DIY 3d printed handbag. Pet Project.
item.description: How I turned a fantasy into a custom 3D‑printed anatomical heart handbag. Navigating CAD tools, prototyping with different materials, and learning as I go.

item.title: Data Pipeline with Airflow and Docker. Work Project.
item.description: This project directly addresses a real-life challenge I encountered in my current role - automating the data pipeline to efficiently process and transform raw Chatfuel data.

item.title: ChatFuel Chrome Extension. Work Project.
item.description: This is a real-life case study about one of my work projects. Facing inefficiencies and limitations of the no-code tool we used, I built a Chrome extension to streamline our data analysis process and enhance error detection.

item.title: Journaling App. Pet project.
item.description: An Expo App for iOS, that records your voice and transcribes it using OpenAI to the text into the Google Doc.

item.title: Postcode bot. Freelance project.
item.description: Telegram bot that used users’ input of zip code to show social, demographic, and economic data about specific area.
